pages.text: Real Filing Reborn features two types of filing folders:$(br2)$(li)$(item)Standard Filing Folder$() - For storing regular items$(li)$(item)NBT Filing Folder$() - For storing items with special properties like enchantments, names, or durability

pages.title: Standard Filing Folder
pages.text: The $(item)Standard Filing Folder$() can store over 2 billion (2,147,483,647) of the same type of item.$(br2)It cannot store items with NBT data (such as enchanted items or items with custom names).

pages.title: NBT Filing Folder
pages.text: The $(item)NBT Filing Folder$() is designed specifically for items with unique properties.$(br2)It can only store items with NBT data and maintains each item's unique properties. Perfect for storing enchanted tools, weapons, or named items.

pages.title: Using Folders
pages.text: To use a folder:$(br)1. Hold the folder in your main hand$(br)2. Place the item you want to store in your off-hand$(br)3. Right-click with the folder$(br)$(br)To extract items:$(br)1. Hold the folder with items stored$(br)2. Shift-right-click with the folder$(br)$(br)Folders can be placed inside Filing Cabinets for better organization.
